about.title: Simon Hällström
about.subtitle: Student
about.description: My name is Simon Hällström Wänfelt, and I was born and raised in Piteå, located in Norrbotten County. Since 2016, I have been living in Stockholm, and currently, I am deepening my skills as a Frontend Developer with a focus on web security at Jensen YH in Kista. I belong to the FWK23S class and am expected to complete my education in the summer of 2025. My lifelong interest in computers has been a driving force that now guides me towards a career in an area that I find extremely fascinating and interesting.

project.title: Projects
project.description: Explore some of my projects by clicking on the links below. Additionally, there are more projects available on my GitHub profile for a more comprehensive overview of my portfolio. There, you can follow my development journey and access my projects.

knowledge.title: Skills
knowledge.description: During my ongoing education, I have absorbed several new programming languages and frameworks. To deepen my skills and strive for excellence in my field, I have engaged in self-studies to master additional frameworks in my free time. Although formally studying to become a Frontend Developer, I have discovered a particular passion for Backend development with Node.js. This insight has broadened my technical horizon and contributes to a versatile skill profile. Thriving in both the worlds of Frontend and Backend strengthens my ability to create integrated and efficient solutions in web development.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or want to reach me? Use the form below to send a message.

projects.title: React & Node.js
projects.subtitle: Frontend, Backend & Auth Project
projects.description: Simple school project in React with login functionality. Frontend in React, Node.js for Backend & Auth server with JWT.

projects.title: Node.js API & React
projects.subtitle: Node.js & React
projects.description: The project features an e-commerce website with a fully functional shopping cart system, login, registration, and the ability to save and restore shopping carts.

projects.title: Vanilla-JS
projects.subtitle: JS Contactbook
projects.description: Previous school project in Vanilla JS, a simple contact book where you can save and delete contacts dynamically.

projects.title: React & MealDB API
projects.subtitle: Node.js, mySQL & Ejs
projects.description: This school project was developed using Vite+React and React-Bootstrap. It utilizes The MealDB API to fetch meal-related data
